Dear fellow countrymen! Dear ladies and gentlemen! I am grateful to my native people who showed great confidence in me and re-elected as president.
I want to assure the Azerbaijani people that afterwards I will serve my dignity to my Nation, I will always defend the interests of the state
The Azerbaijani people have demonstrated their will freely and transparently in these elections. The upcoming presidential elections are the triumph of democracy.
Azerbaijan has all the freedoms. Azerbaijan will continue to develop successfully as a democratic state.
The free and transparent holding of these elections is the next serious step toward democracy.
Freedom of speech, freedom of the press, political freedoms and freedom of conscience are guaranteed in Azerbaijan.
In Azerbaijan, representatives of all peoples and religions live in a peaceful and kind manner as one family.
This is our great supremacy, our great value.
It is no coincidence that Azerbaijan today has become a very important country in the world on issues of national and religious tolerance.
All the processes in our country are in a positive direction. The people have given their high appreciation to the work done over the past ten years in these elections.
A quality education for all should be our global goal. http://t.co/AphVHNUJ2Y  @BrookingsInst JG
For ten years, the foundations of our statehood have been strengthened. Today, the state of Azerbaijan is a strong, independent state.
We have strong ideological grounds. The ideology of Azerbaijanism is our ideological base.
The development and progress in all directions in Azerbaijan is in itself.
Today, we have become a very important country in the world in the solution of international issues.
Azerbaijan has been a member of the UN Security Council two years ago with the support of the world community and is now chairing the organization.
Significant successes have been achieved in the economic sphere in Azerbaijan.
The steps taken and the results of economic reforms over the past decade are the most serious outcomes in the world.
It is no coincidence that these results are reflected in everyday life of people.
Over the last ten years, our economy has grown 3.4 times, while the level of poverty declined by about ten times.
This is the result of serious economic and social policies in the country.
As a result of this policy, Azerbaijan has greatly increased its economic potential.
Economic power will enable us to defend our interests in the international arena as well.
Azerbaijan today plays a role not only in solving regional and world problems, but also increasingly increasing our role.
Large infrastructure projects are being implemented in Azerbaijan, our cities are getting better and better, people's living standards are improving.
According to the ratings of the world's leading economic organizations, Azerbaijan is successfully developing during the global economic and financial crisis.
Our economy has been among the 40 most competitive economies worldwide over the past decade.
All our initiatives are based on regional cooperation. Azerbaijan has progress and progress in all spheres.
Today we can say with pride that Azerbaijan has already become a cosmic state.
All these achievements were possible thanks to the talent and labor of the Azerbaijani people.
Thoughtful politics, the unity between the people and power, and the support of all our initiatives, are the main condition of our success.
Energy policy in Azerbaijan is a matter of great importance not only for the region, but for the world as well.
Today, Azerbaijan plays a role in the world as a modern, independent state, and our opportunities are expanding more and more.
Today, our impact capacity is broad enough in the region.
All this is the result of the work done. All these are the achievements of independent Azerbaijan.
The Azerbaijani people see in everyday life how great our independence is. We are free, we are independent.
Our destiny is in our hands. The votes given to me in these elections, I think, are the voices for independence, freedom, and happy future.
I am very proud that in recent years, all my initiatives have become a reality.
Ten years ago, in 2003, I proclaimed to the people that if I was shown trust, I would remain loyal to Heydar Aliyev's policy.
Over the last decade, commitment to this policy has been greatly enhanced for the development of Azerbaijan, the progress of Azerbaijan.
During these years our independent policy has shown itself in any area.
We can defend, defend, and defend our national interests at the proper level.
For me the interests of the Azerbaijani people, the Azerbaijani state are in the first place.
The unity between the people and the government is essential for the protection of these interests.
I felt the support of the people in all my steps and relied on this support.
Without this support, we could not do anything. The unity and unity between the people and power is one of the factors that distinguish Azerbaijan.
The confidence shown to me by the majority of votes in these elections is the value given to the work done.
It is also a demand, a popular expression of the people's future development in Azerbaijan.
We look at the future with great hopes and great optimism. Ten years of experience adds to this confidence.
Because during the last 10 years, we've achieved great success in any field.
Today, Azerbaijan is looking at the future as a strong, developing, independent state policy.
There are good reasons to look at the future with optimism. Our policies on the following years are clear and clear.
I have repeatedly shared my thoughts on the future of Azerbaijan in different events.
Regularly report to the public about the work done. Today I declare that Azerbaijan will continue to develop on the path of confident development.
Azerbaijan will strengthen its position on the international arena, all international initiatives will protect the interests of the Azerbaijani people
We will pursue a consistent policy on the development of democracy in Azerbaijan.
The process of modern state building will continue.
In the years to come, the fight against corruption and bribery will be even more serious in order to avoid unpleasant incidents
Our policy, our commitment, our steps are supported by the people. Our policy on entrepreneurship development will be continued
We have specific programs - opening new jobs, poverty, reducing unemployment, and replacing imports
The steps taken in this year and in previous years on social policy show how important it is to these issues.
I have repeatedly stated that this is the life and steps that prove that Azerbaijan is a social state.
At the center of our policy is the citizen of Azerbaijan, his concerns, his problems, his safety and his happiness.
In the coming years, we will all go forward only on these directions - economic reforms, social policy, energy policy, foreign policy
The stronger Azerbaijan - we will build a state in which every citizen can feel comfortable and live in peace and tranquility.
The preservation of stability and public order over the past decade has led to these realities.
People in Azerbaijan live in safety and this is one of the distinctive features.
In short, dear compatriots, dear sisters and brothers! I am in the future and I am convinced that you have no doubt.
Azerbaijan will then experience a confident development period.
I will defend the national interests of Azerbaijan as the President of Azerbaijan and I am the President and will ensure the prosperity of the people.
I would like to thank you again for the great support you have shown to me over the last ten years.
Once again I want to assure you that with all my strength, I will work for the prosperity of our native people and strengthening our state.
Together we will achieve great victories. Long live Independent Republic of Azerbaijan!
